# gx-tab-caption

A container for tab items caption. Must be followed by a `gx-tab-page` element containing the tab item content.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

#### disabled

boolean

This attribute lets you specify if the tab page is disabled

#### selected

boolean

This attribute lets you specify if the tab page corresponding to this caption is selected

## Attributes

#### disabled

boolean

This attribute lets you specify if the tab page is disabled

#### selected

boolean

This attribute lets you specify if the tab page corresponding to this caption is selected

## Events

#### onTabSelect

Fired when the tab caption is selected
